description: Table generated with SQL query file time_on_task.sql using the simeon CLI tool. It tracks the analytics about the amount of time spent on course items that are deemed tasks. This is rolled up to the level of a user. Basically, the total amounts of time spent by a specific user, which is different from the time_on_task table. The latter has a granular level of date and user
